credits.transcribedBy: Eric Aasen <Ericaasen1@aol.com>, Mindy Mattingly Phillips & guineapig <shadelet@easynet.co.uk>.

content.description: Monica and Chandler’s, Monica is at the kitchen table and Chandler is in the living room.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Do you realize that four weeks from today we’re getting married? Four weeks baby!! Four weeks!!!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Do you realize you get louder each week?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: There’s still so much to do. Have you written your vows yet?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I figured I’d buy those. Pat, I’d like to buy a vow. (Laughs)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Sweetie, you know I have no sense of humor when it comes to the wedding.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Right. So uh, have you written yours yet?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: No! But I know exactly what I’m going to say.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Do you happen to know what I’m going to say?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Let’s just do it right now. Okay? It won’t be hard. Just say what’s in your heart. (She goes back, sits down, and starts feverishly writing.)
content.parenthetical: handing him a pad of paper and a pen

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: (in his head) Look at her go! She must love me more than I love her! What’s wrong with me? Ooh, don’t open that door .

content.description: Joey and Rachel’s, Chandler is getting help writing his vows from Joey and Ross.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Monica, there are no words… (To Joey and Ross) There are no words! This should not be this hard!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: All right, uh… (To Ross) Oh hey, you’ve done this before Ross, well what did you say when you made up your vows?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Well with Carol, I promised never to love another woman until the day I die. She made no such promise.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I’m so pathetic! Monica knows what she wants to say! You should’ve seen her. Writing, writing, writing!

content.description: Monica and Chandler’s, Monica has hit a writer’s block as Rachel and Phoebe enter.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Monica what?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: What?!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: What is the emergency?!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You have to help me! I’m supposed to be writing my vows and all I have is this! (Shows them what she’s been working on.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Well, I like the pretty little drawing of you in the wedding dress.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Thank you.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Yeah, except your breasts look kinda small. (Points.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Those are my eyes! Those are my breasts. (Points.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh! Yeah! (Monica glares at her.)
[Cut to the guys.]

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Well, why don’t you just start with something simple. Like umm, Monica from the moment I met you, I knew I loved you.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Yeah, I’m not sure I can do that.
[Flashback to when Chandler was introduced to Monica in The One With The Thanksgiving Flashbacks.]

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: …everyone, this is Chandler!

content.speaker: Fat Monica
content.text: Hi, I’m Ross’s little sister.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay.
[Cut to the girls.]

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay. Okay. Okay. Umm, maybe you can start with, “Chandler, even though we were friends; there was a part of me that always knew I wanted more.”
[Flashback to The One With The Jellyfish, Chandler and Monica are lying on the beach.]

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: All right, there’s a nuclear holocaust, I’m the last man on Earth. Would you go out with me?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Ennnh.
[Cut back to the girls.]

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Ooh, are we allowed to lie in the vows?!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Well maybe you don’t talk about your feelings back then. Maybe you just say something about, y’know, all the things that he’s taught you. Like… (They all try to think about one example and don’t succeed.) Or all the things you taught him.
[Flashback to The One With Phoebe’s Uterus, Monica is teaching Chandler how to turn a woman on. They’re in Monica and Rachel’s apartment and Monica has just drawn a diagram of a woman.]

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Now everybody knows the basic erogenous zones. (She starts labelling them) You got one, two three, four (Chandler is shocked to find out there’s more than three), five, six, and seven!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: There are seven?! (Points to one) That’s one?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: It’s kind of an important one!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh, y’know-y’know what, I was looking at it upside down.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Well, y’know, sometimes that helps. (She realises what that could’ve meant.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: All right. Umm, you could uh start out with a little 1, a 2, a 1-2-3, 3, 5, a 4, a 3-2, 2, a 2-4-6, 2-4-6, 4, (Rachel starts getting worked up) 2, 2, 4-7, 5-7, 6-7, 7 …7…7…7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7-7…(mouths 7)! (They both lean back on the couch satisfied.)
[Cut to the guys.]

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Oh, I got it! How about saying something like, “Monica…

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Monica…

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: “…when I look back over our time together…”

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Yeah?
content.parenthetical: writes what Joey said and waits for him to go on

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Well, I can’t do everything! Look back over your time together.
[This starts a series of flashbacks beginning with Monica and Chandler in the waiting room in The One With the Birth.]

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh, look, twins. Hi, guys. Oh, cute, cute.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: No fair. I don’t even have one. How come they get two?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: You’ll get one.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh yeah? When?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: All right. I’ll tell you what. When we’re 40, if neither one of us are married, what do you say you and I get together and have one?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Why won’t I be married when I’m 40?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh, no, no. I just meant hypothetically.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Ok, hypothetically, why won’t I be married when I’m 40?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: No, no, no.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: What is it? Is there something fundamentally unmarriageable about me?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Uh, uh.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Well?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Dear God! This parachute is a knapsack! (throws himself over the back of the chair he was sitting in)
[Cut to Ross leaping into Chandler’s Hotel room in London in The One With Ross’s Wedding.]

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I’m getting married today!! Ahh, whoo-hoo!!(He runs back out the door.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Do you think he knew I was here? (Chandler quickly looks at Monica not knowing what to say.)
content.parenthetical: Comes up for below the covers and looks concerned.

content.text: [Cut to Chandler opening the door to his and Joey’s apartment to reveal Monica standing there with a turkey on her head in The One With The Thanksgiving Flashbacks.]

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Nice try.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Wait, wait, wait! (She puts a Shriner’s hat on the turkey.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Look, Monica…

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Look! (She puts a big, yellow pair of sunglasses on the bird.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: This is not going to work.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I bet this will work! (She starts dancing and Chandler cracks up.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: You are so great! I love you!
(Monica stops suddenly and turns around slowly.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: What?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Nothing! I said, I said “You’re so great” and then I just, I just stopped talking!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You said you loved me! I can’t believe this!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: No I didn’t!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Yes, you did!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: No I didn’t!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You love me!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: No I don’t! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!
(Joey walks in and sees Monica. He freaks out and runs back into the hallway, screaming.)
[Cut to Chandler trying to hint to Monica that he wanted to move in with her in The One After Vegas.]

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Y’know I was thinking, what if I uh, unpack here?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Then all your stuff would be here.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well, what if all my stuff was here?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Then you’d be going back and forth all the time, I mean it doesn’t make any sense.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay. What if we lived together and you understand what I’m saying?
[Cut to Chandler entering his and Monica’s apartment in The One With The Proposal.]
(He walks dejectedly into his apartment to find it lit with about a thousand candles and Monica standing in the living room.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You wanted it to be a surprise.
(He turns to look at Joey who smiles slyly and closes the door leaving them alone.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh my God.
(Monica gets down on one knee.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Chandler… In all my life… I never thought I would be so lucky. (Starting to cry.) As to…fall in love with my best…my best… There’s a reason why girls don’t do this!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay! (He joins her on one knee) Okay! Okay! I’ll do it! Oh God, I thought… (Starting to cry, pauses) Wait a minute, I-I can do this. (Pause) I thought that it mattered what I said or where I said it. Then I realized the only thing that matters is that you, (Pause) you make me happier than I ever thought I could be. (Starting to cry again.) And if you’ll let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way. (Pause as he gets out the ring.) Monica, will you marry me?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Yes.
(The crowd goes wild as he puts the ring on her finger. They hug and kiss this time as an engaged couple.)

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Can we come it yet?! We’re dying out here!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Come in! Come in! (Joey, Rachel, and Phoebe burst through the door.) We’re engaged!!!
(Everyone screams and has a group hug.)

content.description: Central Perk, Phoebe and Rachel are on the couch as Joey and Ross enter.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Hey, what have you guys been up to?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh, we were helping Chandler write his vows, but he kicked us out because Joey kept making inappropriate suggestions.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: How is “Monica, I love your sweet ass,” inappropriate?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: How’s Monica coming along with her vows?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Well let’s just say its.. she’s lucky she has a sweet ass, ‘cause she’s not so good at the writing.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I can’t believe that in four weeks they’re gonnta be married!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Well let’s just hope it works. Y’know, nine out of ten marriages end in divorce?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Phoebe that’s not true.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Yeah, you’re right. How’s the Mrs.?

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I can’t believe they’ve been together for three years.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Has it been that long?!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Believe me, it seems like less because they hid it from us for so long.
[Flashback to Joey interrupting a bath Monica and Chandler are sharing in The One With All The Kissing. Monica dives underwater as Joey opens the door.]
(They move into a kiss but are interrupted by Joey knocking on the door.)

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey, it’s me! I’m comin’ in!
(Monica quickly dives under the water as Joey enters. He looks a little shocked at what Chandler’s doing.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I’ve had a very long, hard day.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Ahh, I’m gonna go get some chicken. Want some?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Ahh, no thanks. No chicken, bye-bye then.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Okay.
(Joey leaves and Monica comes up for air.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Are you okay? I’m so sorry, he wouldn’t leave. He kept asking me about chicken.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Chicken? I could eat some chicken.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Hey Joe!
(Monica goes back underwater as Joey re-enters.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Yeah, can I get a 3-piece, some coleslaw, some beans, and a Coke —(Yelps in pain as Monica grabs him underwater)— Diet Coke .
(Joey gives him a thumbs up and heads for the chicken.)
[Cut back to Central Perk.]

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I don’t know why they didn’t just tell us.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I know! I mean it’s not like we weren’t cool about it.
[This starts a series of flashbacks starting with Monica and Chandler forcing Joey to keep his new-found knowledge of their secret relationship in Monica’s bedroom in The One With All the Kips.]

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: You?! (To Monica) And-and you?!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Yes, but you cannot tell anyone! No one knows!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: How?! When?!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: It happened in London.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: IN LONDON!!!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: The reason we didn’t tell anyone was because we didn’t want to make a big deal out of it.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: But it is a big deal!! I have to tell someone!
(They both grab him and stop him.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: No-no-no-no-no! You can’t!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Please? Please?! We just don’t want to deal with telling everyone, okay? Just promise you won’t tell.
(Joey thinks it over.)

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: All right! Man, this is unbelievable!
[Cut to Rachel listening to a phone conversation between Chandler and Monica in The One With All the Resolutions.]

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I can’t wait to be with you! I’ll just tell Rachel I’m gonna be doing laundry for a couple of hours.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Laundry. Huh. Is that my new nickname? (Rachel is absolutely stunned, she opens her mouth in absolute amazement.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Awww, y’know what your nickname is, Mr. Big…

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Arghh!! (She quickly hangs up the phone and starts to pace around wondering what to do.)
[Cut to Phoebe in Ross’s new apartment looking at Monica and Chandler and what they’re about to do in The One Where Everybody Finds Out.]

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh, look! There’s Monica and Chandler! (Starts yelling.) Hey! Hey, you guys! Hey! (Chandler and Monica start taking each other’s clothes off.) Ohh!! Ohh! Ahh-ahhh!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: What?!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Ahhh!! Chandler and Monica!! Chandler and Monica!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh my God!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Chandler AND Monica!!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: OH MY GOD!!!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: OH!! MY EYES!!! MY EYES!!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Phoebe!! Phoebe!! It’s okay!! It’s okay!!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: NO! THEY’re DOING IT!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I KNOW!! I KNOW!! I KNOW!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: YOU KNOW?!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Yes, I know! And Joey knows! But Ross doesn’t know, so you have to stop screaming!!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: What’s going on?

content.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
content.text: Ohhh!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: HI!! Hi!
content.parenthetical: trying to divert his attention from the window by jumping up and down

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: What?! What?!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Nothing! Oh God, we’re just so excited that you want to get this apartment!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Actually, it looks really good. (Turns towards the window and now Phoebe starts jumping to divert his attention.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Get in here!!! (Motions to join her and Rachel.)
(Ross starts jumping and screaming incoherently and hops over and joins in on the group hug.)
[Cut to later in that episode in Central Perk, a meeting with Phoebe, Rachel, and Joey where they discuss Chandler and Monica.]

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Okay, so now they know that you know, and they don’t know that Rachel knows?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yes, but y’know what? It doesn’t matter who knows what. Now, enough of us know that we can just tell them that we know! Then all the lying and the secrets would finally be over!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Or, we could not tell them we know and have a little fun of our own
[Cut to later in that episode. Rachel and Phoebe are going to a movie from Monica and Chandler’s, and as Phoebe walks by Chandler she pinches him on the butt and exits.]

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: All right honey, we’d better go if we wanna catch that movie.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Bye!

content.speaker: All
content.text: Bye!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Bye Chandler! (She walks up to him.) (Quietly.) I miss you already. (She pinches his butt.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay, did you see that?! With the inappropriate and the pinching!!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Actually, I did!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay, so now do you believe that she’s attracted to me?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Ohhh, oh my God! Oh my God! She knows about us!
[Cut to later in that episode. Monica and Chandler are confronting Joey in his apartment about Phoebe’s knowledge.]

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Phoebe knows about us!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Well I didn’t tell them!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Them?! Who’s them?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Uhhh, Phoebe and Joey.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Joey!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: And Rachel. I would’ve told you but they made me promise not to tell!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh man, they think they are so slick messing with us! But, see, they don’t know that we know that they know! So…

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Ahh yes, the messers become the messees!
[Cut to later in that episode. Phoebe is telling Rachel in Monica and Chandler’s that Chandler wants to make a date with Phoebe.]

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I’ll have to get back to you on that. Okay, bye! (Hangs up.) Oh my God! He wants me to come over and feel his bicep and more!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Are you kidding?!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: No!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I can not believe he would do that to Mon—Whoa! (She stops suddenly and slowly turns to point at Joey. Joey is avoiding her eyes.) Joey, do they know that we know?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: No.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Joey!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: They know you know.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Ugh, I knew it! Oh I cannot believe those two!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: God, they thought they can mess with us! They’re trying to mess with us?! They don’t know that we know they know we know! (Joey just shakes his head.) Joey, you can’t say anything!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I couldn’t even if I wanted to.
[Cut to later in that episode. Chandler is in his bathroom with Monica, and he’s panicking on how far Phoebe is pushing him.]

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Listen, this is totally getting out of hand! Okay? She wants me to put lotion on her!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: She’s bluffing!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Look, she’s not backing down! She went like this! (He does a little mimic of her dance.)
[Cut to the hallway where Phoebe is conferring with Rachel.]

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: He’s not backing down. He went to get lotion.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Oh man! Aren’t you guys done yet?!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Joey look, just look at it this way, the sooner Phoebe breaks Chandler the sooner this is all over and out in the open.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Ooh!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I like that! (To Phoebe) Oh, okay! Show him your bra! He’s afraid of bras! Can’t work ’em! (He swiftly rips open the front of Phoebe’s dress revealing her bra.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Joey! (Examining the dress.) Wow, you didn’t rip off any buttons.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: It’s not my first time.
[Cut to the bathroom.]

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You go back out there, and you seduce her till she cracks!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay, give me a second! (Pause) Did you clean up in here?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Of course.
[Cut back to the living room. Chandler slowly exits the bathroom and gets pushed from behind by Monica and sees Phoebe closing the apartment door.]

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh, you’re-you’re going?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Umm, not without you, lover. (She slowly walks over to him and is showcasing her bra.) So, this is my bra.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: It’s very, very nice. Well, come here. I’m very happy we’re gonna have all the sex.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: You should be. I’m very bendy. (Pause) I’m gonna kiss you now.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Not if I kiss you first.

(They move closer together and Phoebe hesitantly puts her hand on Chandler’s hip. He puts his hand on her waist, but then decides to put his hand on her left hip. Phoebe then grabs his butt. Chandler goes for her breast, but stops and puts his hand on her shoulder.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Ooh.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well, I guess there’s nothing left for us to do but-but kiss.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Here it comes. Our first kiss.

(They slowly and hesitantly move their lips together and kiss gently. Phoebe has her eyes wide open in shock and Chandler is squinting. He finally breaks the kiss after only a short while and pushes Phoebe away.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay! Okay! Okay! You win! You win!! I can’t have sex with ya!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: And why not?!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Because I’m in love with Monica!!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: You’re-you’re what?!
(Monica comes out of the bathroom like a bolt, and Rachel and Joey both enter.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Love her! That’s right, I…LOVE…HER!!! I love her!! (They walk together and hug.) I love you, Monica.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I love you too, Chandler. (They kiss.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I just—I thought you guys were doing it, I didn’t know you were in love!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: So that’s it! It’s over! Everybody knows!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Well actually, Ross doesn’t.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Yes, and we’d appreciate it if no one told him yet.
[Cut to later in that episode. Ross is showing his boss his new place.]

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No! No! Wh… What are you doing?!! (Dr. Ledbetter is slowly backing away.) GET OFF MY SISTER!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.parenthetical: He notices something through the window.

content.description: Central Perk, Phoebe, Rachel, Joey and Ross are talking.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Y’know, you’re friend’s getting married, it’s gotta change things.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: You really think it would be that different?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: How could it not be? I mean pretty soon they’re gonna be having kids, and then they’re just gonna be hanging out with other couples who have kids. And then maybe they’re gonna have to leave the city to be near a Volvo dealership.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Well, things change.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I don’t want them to move to a Volvo dealership!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: It’ll be okay Joe.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I’m sorry, I just…I like things the way they are.
[Flashback to the gang in Central Perk in The One Where Nana Dies Twice, they’re all going through an old photo album.]

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Hey, who’s this little naked guy?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: That little naked guy would be me.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Aww, look at the little thing.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Yes, yes, fine, that is my penis. Can we be grown-ups now?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Who are those people?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Got me.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh, that’s Nana, right there in the middle. (Reads the back) ’me and the gang at Java Joe’s’.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Wow, Monica, you look just like your grandmother. How old was she there?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Let’s see, 1939… yeah, 24, 25?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Looks like a fun gang. (They all look at each other and smile)

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Ooh, look-look-look-look-look! I got Monica naked!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No-no, that would be me again.
[Cut back to Central Perk, Monica and Chandler are entering.]

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Hey, you guys!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Hey.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: What’s going on?

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Well, we were just talkin’ about you guys gettin’ married and how great it is.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yeah, you can get a Volvo . If that’s what you really want.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh that’s so sweet.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: So we both finished our vows.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh, can we read them?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Yeah, I don’t hear Chandler’s and he doesn’t hear mine.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Okay.
(They spilt into their sexes and the girls read Monica’s and the guys read Chandler’s. The girls gasp and groan and the guys laugh hysterically.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh, that’s beautiful.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: (laughing) Funny one! That’s good!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Monica, will-will you marry me?
(Ross laughs.)

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: What? I don’t get it.
(Ross points to the explanation and he gets it.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh man, this is hilarious.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Chandler!!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Don’t worry honey, we’ll make yours funnier.

content.description: Monica and Chandler’s, Ross and Joey are reading Chandler’s new vows.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay, what do you guys think?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Dude!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I have never known love like this.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: You really like it?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Dude! How-how did you write this?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I stole Monica’s and changed the name.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: You can’t do that!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: If he goes first he can!
